import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef, useContext } from 'react' import '../Source/Styles/MenuBar.css' import Samolet from '../Source/Images/Samolet.png' import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { Context } from '../Context' import MenuLink from './MenuLink' import { ContactsSvg, DeclarationsSvg, HomeSvg, TDirectionSvg, TestsSvg, TRansferSvg, ExitSvg } from '../Source/Svgs' import MenuBarProfile from './MenuBarProfile' import AuthButtons from './AuthButtons' export default function MenuBar(props) { const { Auth, setAuth, userData, loading, store } = useContext(Context) return (
{Auth ? : null}
{loading ? null : (Auth ? : )}
) }
